action.action-desc: Mr. Garamendi introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to include certain passenger ferries as eligible and qualified vessels under Capital Construction Funds, and for other purposes.

section.header: Definitions of eligible and qualified vessels

subsection.text: Section 53501(2) of title 46, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A)(iii) by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (B)(v) by striking the period at the end and inserting a semicolon; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: a ferry, as such term is defined in section 2101; and
a passenger vessel or small passenger vessel, as such terms are defined in section 2101, that has a passenger capacity of 50 passengers or greater.

subsection.text: Section 53501(5) of title 46, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A)(iii) by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (B)(v) by striking the period at the end and inserting a semicolon; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: a ferry, as such term is defined in section 2101; and
a passenger vessel or small passenger vessel, as such terms are defined in section 2101, that has a passenger capacity of 50 passengers or greater.

section.text: Section 53503(b) of title 46, United States Code, is amended by inserting (including transportation on a ferry, passenger vessel, or small passenger vessel, as such terms are defined in section 2101, that has a passenger capacity of 50 passengers or greater) after short sea transportation.
